summary: Tested 360 Glam Booth / Fotoshare.co Integration feature. Backend APIs (15/15 tests passed). Frontend UI working correctly - section creation, refresh, and management all functional.
critical_code_review_comments: FotoshareSection.jsx: Well-implemented component with proper data-testid attributes, responsive grid layout, and lightbox modal for video preview
PublicGallery.jsx: Correctly handles fotoshare sections - only renders if videos exist or section is expired
GalleryDetail.jsx: Complete fotoshare section management UI with create, refresh, and display functionality
Backend scraper (server.py lines 67-191): Robust implementation with error handling, expiration detection, and proper video metadata extraction
seed_data_creation: Created test fotoshare sections during testing (TEST_360_Booth_Section, 360 Glam Booth Videos)
context_for_next_testing_agent: 360 Glam Booth / Fotoshare.co Integration feature fully tested. Backend endpoints working: POST /api/galleries/{id}/fotoshare-sections (create), POST /api/galleries/{id}/fotoshare-sections/{section_id}/refresh (refresh), GET /api/galleries/{id}/fotoshare-videos (get videos), DELETE /api/galleries/{id}/fotoshare-sections/{section_id} (delete). Frontend UI working: Add Section form with 360 Booth option, fotoshare URL input, section tabs with camera icon, refresh button, source URL display, last synced timestamp, empty state message. Note: Test URLs return 0 videos as expected since fotoshare.co scraper performs real web scraping.

features_tested.create_fotoshare_section: PASS - 360 Booth sections can be created with fotoshare.co URL
features_tested.invalid_url_validation: PASS - Invalid URLs correctly rejected with error message
features_tested.refresh_fotoshare_section: PASS - Refresh button works and shows toast notification
features_tested.get_fotoshare_videos: PASS - API returns videos (empty for test URLs as expected)
features_tested.get_videos_by_share_link: PASS - Videos can be fetched using share_link
features_tested.section_management_ui: PASS - Section tabs, refresh button, source URL, last synced all display correctly
features_tested.empty_state_handling: PASS - Shows 'No videos found' message when section has 0 videos
features_tested.public_gallery_integration: PASS - FotoshareSection component integrated in PublicGallery.jsx

mocked_apis.note: Fotoshare.co scraping is real web scraping - test URLs return 0 videos as expected
